abstract_summ: As the Coronavirus contagion develops, it is increasingly important to understand the dynamics of the disease . Here, we combine a mathematical model with a cohort analysis approach to determine the range of case fatality rates (CFR) We use a logistical function to describe the exponential growth and subsequent flattening of COVID-19 CFR that depends on three parameters: the final CFR (L), the CFR growth rate (k), and the onset-to-death interval (t0)
